description: Take a quick but invigorating group run through the beautiful Stadtwald Münster, surrounded by trees and fresh air.

locationInfo.description: A scenic route through the Stadtwald, providing a great running path that offers a mix of sunlight and shade along the way.
safetyTips: Wear lightweight clothing and shoes designed for running.
Make sure to hydrate before and after the run.
Stay within the group to avoid getting lost.

description: Try paddleboarding with your group at Aasee for a fun and refreshing activity in the hot weather.

locationInfo.description: Paddleboarding on the serene waters of Aasee is a great way to cool off while enjoying the surrounding views of Münster.
safetyTips: Wear sunscreen and a hat to protect from the sun.
Make sure to wear a life jacket if you are not an experienced paddleboarder.
Be mindful of the water traffic around you and keep a safe distance.

description: Set up a volleyball game with your group at Hammerbrook Park, enjoying some friendly competition in the sun.

locationInfo.description: A spacious park with open fields ideal for an intense but fun volleyball game, perfect for cooling off with some group exercise.
safetyTips: Wear athletic clothing and shoes suitable for outdoor sports.
Drink plenty of water to stay hydrated during the game.
Stretch before the game to avoid muscle strain.

description: Enjoy a light picnic with your group at Promenade Park, taking in the sunshine and relaxing together in the green space.

locationInfo.description: A lovely spot in Münster's city center with plenty of grassy areas perfect for spreading a blanket and enjoying a summer picnic with your group.
safetyTips: Pack a cooler with cold drinks to stay refreshed.
Make sure to use sunscreen, as you'll be outdoors for an extended period.
Clean up the area after your picnic to keep the park clean.

description: Take a cycling trip with your group around the picturesque Lake Möhnesee, enjoying beautiful views and fresh air.

locationInfo.description: A scenic cycling loop around Lake Möhnesee with picturesque views of the water and surrounding countryside. Great for a moderate ride with your group.
safetyTips: Wear a helmet and check your bike before starting.
Bring water to stay hydrated during the ride.
Make sure to follow traffic signs and be aware of other cyclists.
